summary: This appears to be an email from August 10, 2019, with the subject line 'Does this look normal on your computer?' and an attachment titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statementv2.docx'. The email is addressed to 'Public Affairs' at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, suggesting it may be a communication regarding a public statement about Jeffrey Epstein.
keyFacts: An email was sent on August 10, 2019, to the Public Affairs office of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email subject asks 'Does this look normal on your computer?'
The email contains an attachment named 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statementv2.docx', indicating a draft statement concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
The date of the email is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, and his death on August 10, 2019.
